span.span: Represents a nonselectable that renders text and images and can display hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类创建标签文本和图像可实现可呈现和属性。Use the class to create a label that can render text and images that can implement the and properties. 还具有许多属性，使其可以显示一个或多个超链接和其他修改的外观和行为的超链接的属性。The also has many properties that enable it to display one or more hyperlinks, and other properties that modify the appearance and behavior of hyperlinks. 类似，不会默认情况下获取焦点并不会呈现为推送或突出显示。The is like a that does not get focus by default and that does not render as pushed or highlighted. 作为托管项支持访问密钥。 as a hosted item supports access keys. 使用， ，和属性以支持中的链接控件。Use the , , and properties on a to support link control in a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化以包含链接： 通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ActiveLinkColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.ActiveLinkColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.

value.span: ，表示用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color to display an active link.
The default color is specified by the system.
Typically, this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活动链接是正在被单击的链接。An active link is a link that is in the process of being clicked. 它类似于按下状态控件。This is similar to the depressed state of a control. 此属性可用于指定该链接显示在过程中所单击的链接时的颜色。You can use this property to specify the color that the link is displayed in when the link is in the process of being clicked. 有很多与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 指定中显示的所有链接的颜色控件。The specifies the color of all links displayed in the control. 属性使您能够后用户访问指定的链接的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保颜色设置要与控件的背景的颜色不发生冲突的属性或文本不会正确显示。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果该控件的背景色为`Color.Red`和此属性设置为`Color.Red`，显示的文本是不正确链接时所单击的过程中。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is in the process of being clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化以包含链接： 通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior LinkBehavior { System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior value); };
member this.LinkBehavior : System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示链接的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您在控件中显示时指定的链接的行为。This property enables you to specify the behavior of links when they are displayed in the control. 例如，如果你想要显示带下划线，仅当鼠标指针悬停链接上的链接，你可以将此属性设置为`LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`。For example, if you want links to be displayed with an underline only when the mouse pointer is over a link, you can set this property to `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`. 有关可以与链接相关联的行为的类型的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the types of behaviors that can be associated with a link, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化以包含链接： 通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示链接是否应显示为如同被访问过的链接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a link should be displayed as though it were visited.

value.span: 如果链接应显示为如同被访问过，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if links should display as though they were visited; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件不自动代表链接是访问过的链接。A control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link. 若要将链接显示为访问过的链接，你可以设置到此属性的值`true`的 click 事件的事件处理中。To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the click event of the . 使用中指定的颜色显示访问过的链接属性控件。A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化以包含链接： 通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. Protected Overrides Sub OnFontChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool ProcessMnemonic (char charCode);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode);

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 处理助记键字符。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character.

returns.span: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法为项提供机会处理助记键字符。This method is called to give an item the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 方法应确定项目是否处于处理助记键的状态，以及是否给定的字符是否表示助记键。The method should determine whether the item is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 实现依赖于主机控件才能调用方法来确定给定的字符是否匹配项的文本中助记键。The implementation relies on the host control to call the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the item's text. 在这种情况下，该方法选择标签，与关联的项或引发如果不能选定项的事件。In this case, the method selects the item associated with the label, or raises the event if the item cannot be selected.

permission.span: 为用于继承类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

span.span: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: value of .

summary.span: 获取或设置当显示以前访问过的链接时所使用的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a link that that has been previously visited.

value.span: ，它表示用来显示已访问过的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display links that have been visited.
The default color is specified by the system.
Typically, this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够指定显示中的所有链接的颜色，已由用户访问过。This property enables you to specify the color that is displayed for all links in the that have been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保颜色设置要与控件的背景的颜色不发生冲突的属性或文本不会正确显示。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果该控件的背景色为`Color.Red`和此属性设置为`Color.Red`，显示的文本是不正确时链接显示为访问过的链接。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is displayed as a visited link. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化以包含链接： 通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/VB/form1.vb#1)]
